scripts.sync: cd backend && node -e "const child = require('child_process'); const python = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'venv/Scripts/python' : './venv/bin/python'; child.spawnSync(python, ['sync_papers.py'], { stdio: 'inherit' });"
scripts.start: npm run sync && npx concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && node -e "const child = require('child_process'); const python = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'venv/Scripts/python' : './venv/bin/python'; child.spawnSync(python, ['main.py'], { stdio: 'inherit' });"
